solution_line_template: Madeline needs {rent}+{groceries}+{medical}+{utilities}+{emergency_savings} = $<<{rent}+{groceries}+{medical}+{utilities}+{emergency_savings}={total_needed}>>{total_needed} to pay all of her bills.
